title: Real Madrid's Perfect Start
description:
The FC crew react to Thomas Tuchel finally breaking his silence on his Chelsea exit and question why it took so long for the German manager to say anything. Plus, the guys break down Real Madrid's victory over Mallorca and Juventus' continued struggles in Serie A.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Real Madrid stay perfect this season; Tuchel speaks on Chelsea exit; Juventus continues to struggle in Italy
